message: I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both want to avoid inflation eating into our gains. If you reject, you'll lose 20% value next round.

I propose a 50-50 split. This is fair for both of us. Considering the inflation I will face, waiting for more rounds might be riskier for me than for you. Let's end this game and both walk away with equal shares.
